meanings.definition: The act of dislodging or being dislodged from a place or position.
meanings.sent1: The sudden dislodgements of rocks caused a loud noise.
meanings.sent2: After the earthquake, many dislodgements of furniture were evident.
meanings.sent3: The dislodgements of the books from the shelf startled the cat.
meanings.sent4: Her decision to leave the company led to dislodgements in the team dynamics.
meanings.sent5: The dislodgements of snow from the roof were a sign of spring approaching.

meanings.definition: The state of being dislodged or removed from a place or position.
meanings.sent1: The dislodgements of the boulder left a noticeable gap in the wall.
meanings.sent2: The dislodgements of the tiles revealed a hidden compartment.
meanings.sent3: The dislodgements of the puzzle pieces made completing it even more challenging.
meanings.sent4: The dislodgements of the old traditions paved the way for new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The dislodgements of the sandcastle by the waves saddened the children.
